name: TETRIS (itch) (Kino_Kat, Wakabaga)
description:
Student project 6 - Theme: Falling

Kino-Kat  https://kino-kat.itch.io/

Dio  https://wakabaga.itch.io/

  • Control inputs：

WASD move 

Space hard drop

Q&E rotate

  • Small tips：

Boom cube can destroy any cube in 9x9.

Random falling speed.

Every 30s the world will be upside down.

Every 8 tetris comes with a random block.

Blocks can be clear as Tetris.
